Items.Name: Aqua Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Water damage

Items.Name: Basic Airship
Items.Description: An airship with a capacity of 13.  Not very good for combat.

Items.Name: Basic Weapon
Items.Description: Basic type of any weapon (no modifiers)

Items.Name: Dangerous Mushroom
Items.Description:
Requires a resilience roll:
-	Success: Heal 1d6 HP
-	Minor Success: Heal 1d6 HP but gain Poison
-	Fail: Gain Poison

Items.Name: Evil Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Dark damage

Items.Name: Flame Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Fire damage

Items.Name: Frost Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Ice damage

Items.Name: Lazarus Tonic
Items.Description: Revives a fainted comrade in battle

Items.Name: Medicine
Items.Description: Heals 2d10 HP, but can only be used outside of battle

Items.Name: Rock Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Earth damage

Items.Name: Saintly Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Holy damage

Items.Name: Shock Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Lightning damage

Items.Name: Wind Grenade
Items.Description: A grenade that does 1d6 Air damage

Items.Name: Lockpick
Items.Description: Picking a lock does not require a Tinker roll

Items.Name: Boat
Items.Description: A water craft that carries 3 people and can cross still water

Items.Name: Yacht
Items.Description: A water craft that carries 5 people and can cross oceans

Items.Name: Light Ship
Items.Description: A water craft that carries 11 people and can cross oceans

Items.Name: Jetpack
Items.Description: Allows an individual to fly any distance

Items.Name: Helicopter
Items.Description: A flying craft that carries 4 people and can cross up to 8 areas before needing to land

Items.Name: Light Airship
Items.Description: A flying craft that carries 7 people and can cross long distances

Bestiary.Name: Arctic Sniper
Bestiary.Description: A white-coated person with a long-range rifle
Bestiary.Attacks: Shot: 1d10-1 Ice damage.

Bestiary.Name: Armored Rhino
Bestiary.Description: A rhinoceros with a thick metal hide
Bestiary.Attacks:
Charge: 1d12 damage

Ground Stomp: 1d8 damage to 2 enemies

Bestiary.Name: Baterina
Bestiary.Description: A giant bat with legs that wears a tutu
Bestiary.Attacks: Bite: 1d12 damage.  Causes Mania

Bestiary.Name: Brown Dragon
Bestiary.Description: Dragons the size of human beings with thick brown scales
Bestiary.Attacks:
Scratch: 1d8+3 damage

Bite: 1d8 damage.  Will latch onto a character causing the following: -1 to Movement Rolls and automatic 1d4 damage until free

Dirt Tail Whip: 1d6 ranged Earth damage plus causes Blind.

Bestiary.Name: Crystal Squid
Bestiary.Description: A squid that can swim
Bestiary.Attacks:
Snap: 1d10 damage to a single player

Embrace: 1d4 damage.  Traps the player who must make a move to escape

Water Jet: 1d10 damage to all players

Bestiary.Name: Dark Wolf
Bestiary.Description: A tall wolf with charcoal-like skin
Bestiary.Attacks: Bite: 1d10 damage

Bestiary.Name: Electric Eel
Bestiary.Description: An underwater creature that shoots electricity
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bite: 1d10 damage

Shock: 1d8 Lightning damage to all enemies.  Causes Paralysis.

Bestiary.Name: Experiment
Bestiary.Description: A person that has been experimented on and no longer looks human.  Arms have been replaced with guns
Bestiary.Attacks: Manic Shot: 1d8 -1 damage.  Causes mania

Bestiary.Name: Fire Scorpion
Bestiary.Description: A big scorpion that has does fire damage
Bestiary.Attacks:
Sting: 1d12 fire damage.  Causes burn.

Pinch: 1d4.  Traps the player who must make a move to escape.

Bestiary.Name: Flying Drone
Bestiary.Description: A robot in the air that can shoot an enemy
Bestiary.Attacks: Laser Shot: 1d6 damage

Bestiary.Name: Giant Weasel
Bestiary.Description: A giant weasel
Bestiary.Attacks: Attack: 1d6 damage

Bestiary.Name: Gunner Soldier
Bestiary.Description: A soldier with a gun
Bestiary.Attacks:
Gunshot: 1d10 damage to an enemy

Gun Spray: 1d4 damage to all enemies

Bestiary.Name: Hammercat
Bestiary.Description: A cat wielding a maul
Bestiary.Attacks:
Blinding Bite: 1d4+1 damage.  Causes blind.

Smash: 1d10+2 damage.

Bestiary.Name: Hornet Swarm
Bestiary.Description: A swarm of stinging hornets
Bestiary.Attacks: Venomous Sting: 1d4+1 damage to all enemies.  Causes Poison.

Bestiary.Name: Lizard Samurai
Bestiary.Description: An lizard creature with a katana
Bestiary.Attacks:
Slash: 1d8 damage.  Causes Bleed.

Bite: 1d10-1 damage.

Bestiary.Name: Magmus
Bestiary.Description: A humanoid creature made of lava rock
Bestiary.Attacks: Fire Punch: 1d8 Fire damage.

Bestiary.Name: Marionette
Bestiary.Description: A marionette.  A puppet on strings.
Bestiary.Attacks: Slap: 1d8 damage

Bestiary.Name: Mollusk
Bestiary.Description: A creature with an oyster-like body, lobster legs, and pincers
Bestiary.Attacks: Clamp: 1d8+1 damage

Bestiary.Name: Muskroom
Bestiary.Description: A muskrat covered in mushrooms
Bestiary.Attacks:
Scratch: 1d4+3 damage

Bite: 1d4 damage.  Causes Poison.

Spore Cloud: Cause Poison on all enemies

Bestiary.Name: Ring of Fire
Bestiary.Description: A literal floating circle of fire
Bestiary.Attacks: Fireball: 1d8 fire damage.  Causes Burn.

Bestiary.Name: Ring of Lightning
Bestiary.Description: A literal floating circle of electricity
Bestiary.Attacks: Lightning Strike: 1d8 Lightning damage.  Causes Paralysis.

Bestiary.Name: Rock Beast
Bestiary.Description: A humanoid creature made of dirt and rock
Bestiary.Attacks:
Rock Punch: 1d10 Earth damage

Grab: Entrap an enemy

Bestiary.Name: Skeleton Knight
Bestiary.Description: A skeleton in armor with a sword
Bestiary.Attacks: Slash: 1d8 damage

Bestiary.Name: Snow Vixen
Bestiary.Description: A giant white fox
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bite: 1d10 damage

Scratch: 1d6 damage

Snow Beam: 1d10 Ice damage

Bestiary.Name: Tortussle
Bestiary.Description: A giant tortoise with glowing eyes
Bestiary.Attacks: Bite: 1d12+2 damage

Bestiary.Name: Walking Shark
Bestiary.Description: A shark on two legs
Bestiary.Attacks: Bite: 1d10 damage.  Once bitten, 3 damage every turn until the enemy escapes.

Bestiary.Name: Waterbone
Bestiary.Description: A skeleton inside a bubble of water
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bubble Attack: 1d10 Water damage

Bone Attack: 1d12 Dark damage.

Bestiary.Name: Spiderbot
Bestiary.Description: A robotic spider with a cannon up top
Bestiary.Attacks: Laser Shot: 1d6 damage

Bestiary.Name: Yellow Dragon
Bestiary.Description: A dragon with yellow scales
Bestiary.Attacks:
Wind Blast: 1d10 Air damage

Scratch: 1d8 - 1 Piercing damage

Bestiary.Name: Sand Crusader
Bestiary.Description: A warrior dressed in robes carrying a staff
Bestiary.Attacks:
Holy Strike: 1d6 Holy damage

Blinding Light: 1d10 -2 Holy damage.  Causes Blind

Bestiary.Name: Living Snow
Bestiary.Description: A group of snowflakes that seem to be sentient
Bestiary.Attacks:
Strike Fear: 1d4-1 damage.  Causes Scared.

Pelt Ice: 1d10 Ice damage.

Bestiary.Name: Shard Swarm
Bestiary.Description: Flying intelligent pieces of glass
Bestiary.Attacks:
Multi-Attack: 1d6-1 damage.  Causes Bleed.

Mirror: Take a turn to cast Mirror.  The next time the Shard Swarm is attack, whoever attacks will get the same damage.

Bestiary.Name: Fire Spirit
Bestiary.Description: An undead creature that flies and is made of fire
Bestiary.Attacks: Fireball: 1d10 - 1 Fire damage.  Causes Burn.

Bestiary.Name: Psycho Borealis
Bestiary.Description: An ethereal creature made of an array of lights
Bestiary.Attacks:
Manic Attack: 1d6-1 Holy damage.  Causes Mania.

Fright Attack: 1d6-1 Holy damage.  Causes Scared.

Bestiary.Name: Sawbot
Bestiary.Description: A robot with buzzsaw for hands
Bestiary.Attacks: Shred: 1d12 - 1 damage.  Causes Bleed.

Bestiary.Name: Snowbug
Bestiary.Description: A large insectoid ice creature
Bestiary.Attacks:
Bite: 1d10 damage.

Showshot: 1d6+1 Ice damage.

Bestiary.Name: Cave Troll
Bestiary.Description: A troll that lives in a cave.
Bestiary.Attacks:
Smash: 1d8+5 damage.

Frightening Stance: Causes Scared.

Bestiary.Name: Thunderclapper
Bestiary.Description: Flying robotic hands that are electrically charged
Bestiary.Attacks: Electric Slap: 1d10+1 Lightning damage.

Bestiary.Name: Frog Lancer
Bestiary.Description: A humanoid frog carrying a lance
Bestiary.Attacks: Stab: 1d10 damage.

Bestiary.Name: Eagle Flock
Bestiary.Description: A group of eagles
Bestiary.Attacks:
Manic Screech: A screech that causes Mania.

Peck: 1d12-1 damage.

Bestiary.Name: Swarm of Mosquitos
Bestiary.Description: A swarm of mosquitos
Bestiary.Attacks: Swarm of Bites: 1d12+1 damage.  Causes Paralysis.

Bestiary.Name: Ice Knight
Bestiary.Description: A person in white armor in the snow.
Bestiary.Attacks:
Attack: 1d6+1 damage.

Ice Blast: 1d6-1 Ice damage.

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Big Ears
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Sense roll when listening to others' conversations

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Call of the Wild
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: Spend 1 SP to summon a Wolf to your side if in a forest.  Wolf has 4 HP and can do 1d6 damage and has its own turn during combat.

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Cavern Explorer
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Sense roll when inside a cave or cavern

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Chef
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Tinker for creating a delicious meal that will restore 1d4 HP or SP

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Detective
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Search when investigating a crime

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Good Shepherd
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Sense when attempting to wrangle a plant-eating animal

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Informed Traveller
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Knowledge roll for information about a city/town you haven't been to before

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: King Speech
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Diplomacy when speaking to rulers of nations

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Mountain Climber
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Brawn roll for climbing mountains

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Prosecutor
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Diplomacy when you try to convince others that someone is lying (whether it's true or not)

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Natural Athlete
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Brawn when competing in an athletic event

Sample_Custom_Moves.Name: Entomologist
Sample_Custom_Moves.Description: +2 to Search when searching for bugs
